description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Mexico vs Jamaica in the Friendlies Women
title: Mexico vs Jamaica: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: Mexico vs Jamaica: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 1 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Tiffany Cameron (Jamaica) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kayla McKenna.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Trudi Carter (Jamaica).
Post
Attempt missed. Nicole Pérez (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jasmine Casárez.
